statement.p: In 40.63 of the last 32 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{32}}={0.4063}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{32}. \displaystyle{P}={0.4063}\cdot{32}={13.0016}. This is the number of days that it rained. We want the non-rainy days which is 32-13.0016=18.9984 We round that as requested to 19.
